system.availability: Useful for gaining illegal substances, information, assassinations, or all the other resources of a criminal network. Most only care for hard cash, although some representatives of larger organisations may ask for a favour at a later date. For Stats see Dark Heresy 2E Core: Page 386-388.
system.cost: A wide category of individuals performing illegal activities such as narco-dealers, thugs, oilers, hired killers, skulkers, etc.
